Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Maximum contraction of vena cava to norepinephrine ( 37 % control ) also was reduced but no change in response to ET - 1 was observed .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Vena cava contraction |

In this paragraph, the only potential disease entity mentioned is the "maximum contraction of vena cava," which refers to the ability of the vena cava (a large vein that carries deoxygenated blood from the lower body to the heart) to contract in response to certain stimuli.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Vena cava contraction |

In this paragraph, the only clearly mentioned disease entity is the potential impairment or reduction in the ability of the vena cava to contract, as stated by "maximum contraction of vena cava to norepinephrine (37% control) was reduced."

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Maximum contraction of vena cava to norepinephrine ( 37 % control ) also was reduced but no change in response to ET - 1 was observed .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| norepinephrine |
| ET-1 |

In this paragraph, "norepinephrine" and "ET-1" are the chemical entities mentioned.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| norepinephrine |
| ET-1 |

In the paragraph, "maximum contraction" and "to" are not chemical entities. "Was reduced" and "was observed" are actions performed on the entities, not the entities themselves. "But no change" is a statement about the response to ET-1, not ET-1 itself. Therefore, only "norepinephrine" and "ET-1" are valid chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph.
